fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 49.15 points or 0.27% to settle at 18,315.10. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 3.19% to 13.08. HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, State Bank of India were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The May 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 May 2023.
